---
title: Predefined themes
layout: article
---

This library contains the following predefined themes, which override the colors defined by the docs-generator itself. See {@link Theme here} for a list of variables a theme could override.

## FKUI

- https://github.com/Forsakringskassan/designsystem

### Usage

To use this theme, first include the FKUI variable file. Then, you must import the path `@forsakringskassan/docs-generator/theme/fkui` to your styling file.
